nodes.text: This pin-up of a handmaiden was a decorative poster available in the galaxy during at the time of the Clone Wars. The poster showed a human woman in a sensual pose, wearing the same kind of orange/yellow robes worn by Padmé Amidala's handmaidens.
The handmaiden pin-up was painted by Justin Ridge, and was developed for The Clone Wars episode "Rookies", even though the pin-up is not seen in the actual episode.
